title: California Attorney General Moves To Stop Anti-Gay Ballot Proposal
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Vikram Amar, a law professor at the University of California, Davis, about the attorney general's move to halt a proposed initiative.
contentencoded:
NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Vikram Amar, a law professor at the University of California, Davis, about the attorney general's move to halt a proposed initiative that would allow gays and lesbians to be "put to death by bullets to the head."

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
